RelatedSentence: Our tipsters tell us Sir Patrick , along with an unidentified man and woman , showed up at the Jose Andres Penn Quarter outpost around 7 p.m.   Saturday wearing a gray suit , purple shirt and no tie .
Earlier that day , Stewart , who plays Professor X in the Marvel Comics big screen franchise , was on hand to present collectibles from the film to the Smithsonian .
The National Museum of American History can now count the costumes of mutant superheroes Professor Xavier , Magneto , Wolverine and Storm among its collection .
The Twitter star ( Stewart has more than 1.2 million followers ) tweeted this about the publicity blitz for the film that opens on Friday .
